_aChangeLog.text: fixed trigger for s2/s3 to prevent boost
fixed trigger and new filter for s6 to prevent boost

_sText:
CSGO Version:Â https://gamebanana.com/maps/209298

This map was made for the KSF spring mapping contest 2020 in 20 days total.

The contest's theme was 'sunnyhappylove' - with that in mind, you start off by leaving your office after your working hours and go through various outside and inside areas that resemble a range of free time activities or/and are nature themed.

The map is designed as a staged linear map / linear map with checkpoints.

It features six stages, but there are multiple routes to complete this map in a linear fashion.

Each route varies in difficulty as can be seen in the three linked videos below this post.

The goal was to offer experienced surfers multiple shortcut possibilities that vary in difficulty, but also give more casual surfers a good chance at beating the map.

Tier (based on a stage-by-stage completion): 3

Stages: 6

Bonuses: 1

Important: the map is intended to be played with sv_maxvelocity set to 5000 (or more since you do not reach 5000 anyway on 66 tick)


Important2: the map is compiled with HDR lighting only - turn HDR on or it will be fullbright

Here are showcases of three different routes, depending on your experience you can combine / leave out different skips that are shown in the videos - or maybe find new ones?

Stage-by-Stage Route:



Fast-Linear Route:
